tasks.label: start-app
tasks.command:
echo -e "\033[1;32mDev shell started...\033[0m"; [ -f start.sh ] && echo -e "
'start.sh' found. Executing..." && while ! bash start.sh; do echo -e "
Failed. Retrying in 3s..."; sleep 3; done && echo -e "
'start.sh' finished." || echo -e "
'start.sh' not found. Skipping."
